block.p: Laura Felice Jacobs, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Howard S. Jacobs of Roslyn, N.Y., was married last evening to Robert M. Girvin 5th, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Girvin 4th of Breckenridge, Colo. Rabbi Eugene Lipsey performed the ceremony at Harrison House, a conference center in Glen Cove, N.Y.

The bride, 28, is a senior director of marketing at Banana Republic, the clothing retailer, in San Francisco. She graduated from Duke University. Her father is a partner in Rosemann & Colin, a New York law firm. Her mother, Arlene C. Jacobs, teaches English at the Herricks Middle School in Albertson, N.Y.

Laura Felice Jacobs, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Howard S. Jacobs of Roslyn, N.Y., was married last evening to Robert M. Girvin 5th, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Girvin 4th of Breckenridge, Colo. Rabbi Eugene Lipsey performed the ceremony at Harrison House, a conference center in Glen Cove, N.Y.

The bride, 28, is a senior director of marketing at Banana Republic, the clothing retailer, in San Francisco. She graduated from Duke University. Her father is a partner in Rosemann & Colin, a New York law firm. Her mother, Arlene C. Jacobs, teaches English at the Herricks Middle School in Albertson, N.Y.

The bridegroom, 33, is a vice president and an institutional stockbroker in San Francisco for Credit Suisse First Boston. He graduated from Amherst College and received an M.B.A. from the University of California at Los Angeles. His mother, Judy Girvin, owns the Bay Street Company, a housewares store, and his father is an owner of Timberhill Associates Real Estate, both in Breckenridge.
